metadata.title: CVE-2021-22134 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A document disclosure flaw was found in Elasticsearch versions after 7.6.0and before 7.11.0 when Document or Field Level Security is used. Getrequests do not properly apply security permissions when executing a queryagainst a recently updated document. This affects documents that have beenupdated and not yet refreshed in the index. This could result in the searchdisclosing the existence of documents and fields the attacker should not beable to view.

criterions.comment: elasticsearch package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
